accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Leonard Scott Collection of Union Carbide Labor Documents #6314. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: The Smackdown of the American Worker: How It Happened and What Should Be Done About It

scopecontent.p: Self-published book by Leonard C. Scott.

did.unittitle: Union Carbide Crystal Products Plant, Telegram and Letter.

scopecontent.p: East Chicago, IL. Letter is a photocopy.

did.unittitle: Union Carbide Crystal Products Plant, Strike.
Union Carbide Crystal Products Plant, Negotiations.
Union Carbide Crystal Products Plant and the Oil, Chemical and Atomic Workers International Union Agreement.
Union Carbide Crystal Products Plant, Communications. [folder 1 of 3]
Union Carbide Crystal Products Plant, Communications. [folder 2 of 3]
Union Carbide Crystal Products Plant, Communications. [folder 3 of 3]
Oil, Chemical and Atomic Workers International Union Organizing Manual
Lottie Czarnecki's Union Card from the International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers Union.
Thaddeus Czarnecki's Dues Books from the Bakery and Confectionary Workers International Union of America
Thaddeus Czarnecki's Union Cards from the Bakery and Confectionary Workers International Union of America
Bakery and Confectionary Workers International Union of America Union Pins

scopecontent.p: 3 pins likely from Thaddeus Czarnecki, father of Leonard C. Scott.
